title: 38. An Advanced Lesson in SPF: The Science of Photo-Aging, New Technology, Tinted Formulas, Chemical Vs. Mineral, Blue Light + Why Sunscreen Isn't Enough! With Neova Smart Skincare.
description:
Hi Roomies,

Welcome to the first episode of my new series, #BehindTheBrand where I'm chatting with experts at top clinical skincare lines on the market to understand the products, the technology behind them, and give exposure to esties about what's on the market and why it works!

In this episode I'm talking to NEOVA Director of Brand Education, Kate Riley.

Shop Neova Smart Skincare

You can use my affiliate code Tessa15 for 15% off Neova products

Email Kate: kriley@pharma-comsetics.com

This episode covers:

  • What is photoaging?
  • What differentiates NEOVA from other brands?
  • What are the advantages of a tinted sunscreen?
  • Why do I want DNA Repair Enzymes in my sunscreen/products?
  • Do I really need sunscreen everyday?
  • Bluelight and how to protect against it 
  • Do you need to wear SPF if inside?
  • Chemical versus Mineral filters
  • Choosing an honest sunscreen

You can shop my Glymed store here

or DM me on Instagram to purchase IS Clinical

MY SOCIAL MEDIA:

Tess' Instagram @myestytessa

Tess' YouTube: Tess Zolly 

Tess' TikTok: @myestytessa

Sweet by LiQWYD | https://www.instagram.com/liqwyd

Music promoted by https://www.free-stock-music.com Creative Commons Attribution 3.0
